string-array.name: fixes
string-array.item: Finally found issue with weather not updating in the background.
Fixed issue with temperature text not changing colour.

string-array.name: ver6
string-array.item: Version 6 has the app rebuilt from the ground up, hence a new fresh UI!
The weather not refreshing in the background has finally been fixed! Took me a while to experiment to see what the actual issue was :)
Version 6 brings many new features, improvements and specific changes to how the weather works with location.
Please read the change log carefully to understand the changes.

string-array.name: ver602
string-array.item: Fixed issue with weather not downloading if GPS was used directly for Open Weather Map and Weather Underground.

string-array.name: ver602002
string-array.item: Fixed issue with widget being disappearing if more than one was placed.

string-array.name: weatherloc
string-array.item: Added Weather Underground API support - API key required, read below.
To use the Weather Underground API, you must sign-up to their services and enter the api key in the Weather Providers settings in the Pill Customisation.
You can now enter your own api key for Open Weather Map. The app does include a default api key but it is not recommended to use as the daily api limit is regulary used up.
To use the default api key, enter # (without the quotes) as the api key in Open Weather Map settings.
"You can now save your location in the app so that you don't have to keep GPS turned on to get the weather. Configure this in the Location settings."
NOTE: THIS DOES NOT WORK WITH GOOGLE AWARENESS, AS THE API DOES NOT WORK WITHOUT GPS.
